courseSection0.text:
College of Arts and Humanities
English Department
Trevor Colbourn Hall (TCH) 250A
english@ucf.edu
Department Chair: James Campbell
407-823-5596

Minor Admission Requirements
None
Minor Requirements
None
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
ENG3014 - Theories and Techniques of Literature Study (3)
courseSection0.text1: ENG 3014- PR for all 4000 level AML, ENG, ENL, and LIT courses

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 15 credits from the following types of courses: 
English courses with AML, ENG, ENL, or LIT prefixes chosen by student and departmental advisor.
A list of approved restricted elective courses is found in the myKnight audit.

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 12 hours used in the minor must: At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department, and must be regularly scheduled, upper level courses.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection0.text:
Other Requirements

A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department, and must be regularly scheduled, upper level courses.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
